data.actual_result: Timestamp is placed slightly above the ">" icon and part of it goes past the right side of the screen.
data.expected_result: Like other entries, the timestamp is below the log title.
data.short_description: Audit log entry with more than 1 line in title make the timestamp to move to a weird space above ">". iPhone XS Max specific.
data.steps_to_repro: - Make any changes to the server such that the audit log entry has 2 lines. - Go to Audit Log and observe.
